Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $10000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a product that is worth more to you than its cost, maximizing your investment and satisfaction. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if there's any way I can assist you further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
